body:
You can update your payment information at any time by going to: Settings > Billing Information.

How do I change my payment method?

To change your payment method, go to "Billing Information".

1. Click in the top right corner.

2. Enter your name and billing address.

3. Add a new credit card or PayPal account.

4. Click to make it your default payment method, meaning it's the main payment method you would like to use moving forward. Any other payment methods on your account will be used as backup in case the default fails.

How do I remove payment methods?

We need to have at least one payment method on file if you've launched a campaign. To remove payment methods, click .

Removing a payment means that the payment method can't be used as backup anymore. We recommending uploading at least one other payment method as backup to avoid any interruption in campaign activity.
name: Updating or Removing Payment Information
title: Updating or Removing Payment Information
